alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:13AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms, with heavy rainfall, will impact portions of Pierce, western Brantley, central Ware, southeastern Bacon, southwestern Wayne and southeastern Appling Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1212 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms, with heavy rainfall, along a line extending from 6 miles west of Gardi to 9 miles north of Stephen Foster State Park. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Jesup, Blackshear, Nahunta, Patterson, Gardi, Screven, Odum, Offerman and Boggy Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways, especially at night.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne
